currentPost.title: CDA Weekend: The Art and Science of Dentistry
currentPost.excerpt: Dental and business professionals alike gather at The Art and Science of Dentistry in the Anaheim Convention Center. Doctor Genius [ More.. ]
currentPost.content:
Dental and business professionals alike gather at The Art and Science of Dentistry in the Anaheim Convention Center. Doctor Genius will have a booth, 234, at the CDA event, in Anaheim, CA, from Thursday, May 4, to Saturday, May 6, 2017. With over 50 lectures on a variety of topics focusing on dentistry, over 175 practice-changing courses, over 550 exhibitors from professionals in the dental market and “130,000 square feet of dental innovation,” the CDA website writes, there is much for attendees to look forward to at this event.

An excellent opportunity

The California Dental Association, CDA, event, The Art and Science of Dentistry provides professionals in almost every category of dentistry a chance to meet in a community of like-minded individuals. Booths will not only sell services or products but will also provide the platform for professionals to network and enhance their services to others. The website explains that this event is “among the largest tradeshows in the United States,” giving attendees the chance to truly enhance their practice with the latest technology available for purchase and a plethora of continuing education courses. With events, speakers, presentations and courses each day, professionals will be able to experience something new each day. Attendees from out of county or state can stay at a hotel and receive different rates by booking through the CDA event website. The CDA event is also family friendly. Parents of children do not need to worry as there are also family hours and child care available. According to the event website, parents can bring their children 10 years of age or younger in for free from 9:30 a.m. to 12 p.m. each day. Parents can also utilize the available child care since children will not be able to attend lectures or workshops with their parents.

There is still time to register

“With over 50 lectures on a variety of topics focusing on dentistry, over 175 practice-changing courses, over 550 exhibitors from professionals in the dental market and “130,000 square feet of dental innovation,” the CDA website writes, there is much for attendees to look forward to at this event.”
Doctor Genius will have multiple representatives at the event, in booth 234 to promote our services, such as practice marketing, website development and more. Our very own Phillip Lopez, VP of Sales, and Andres R. Gutierrez, VP of Client Services, will be at the booth with other sales representatives to help offer our services. Our team will go over how we can help dental professionals market their practice and attract new patients. Attendees can learn about the levels of our services, any available deals and how to sign up. We can help a practice build a stronger online presence and draw in more patients through the digital market. We can also offer $500 off the initial price for our services, visit our booth for more information or give us a call. If anyone is interested in registering for the event, there is still time. All one has to do is visit the CDA Presents website and enter the information. The website can also go over hotel rates and any other questions one might have. This event will be an excellent opportunity to view the latest and greatest in dental technology, do not miss out. We hope to see you there.

Doctor Genius

At Doctor Genius, we work with clients to expand their private practice by helping them reach, engage and convert consumers into new patients. By offering high-end web marketing services to medical and health professionals throughout the United States, we help clients gain more profit and build trustworthy relationships with patients to initiate sustainable practice growth.

We construct a website for your practice, establish an active online presence, build and constantly update social media profiles, help you build stronger connections with patients, streamline the appointment scheduling process, funnel traffic from search engines directly to your practice website and much more. To begin the process of increasing the success and presence of your practice, give us a call at 877-477-2311.

prevPost.content:
The California Dental Association, CDA, is presenting The Art of Science and Dentistry at the Anaheim Convention Center in Anaheim, CA, from Thursday, May 4 to Saturday, May 6, 2017. This event is a weekend full of the latest advancements in dentistry, courses on effective dental practice techniques, over 550 exhibitors from all areas of the dental market and a plethora of speakers; among which, Doctor Genius will be present.

Offering the marketing solutions a dental practice needs

Dental practices can greatly benefit from having a strong online presence and active website. Doctor Genius not only offers professionals a chance for a stronger online presence, but we also keep the website active and use key marketing techniques to help professionals extend their reach online. Doctor Genius will be at booth #234 at the CDA event to go over the marketing solutions and available technologies. Here is a list summarizing our services.

Website

We create custom content and personalize websites for each client. At Doctor Genius, the client can feel safe knowing that the website contains all of his or her services in one place.

Branding

We also deliver effective brand strategies to help give practices a major edge in competitive markets. We will use the proper branding to highlight the client’s services and areas of expertise.

Search Marketing

We can narrow down the list of keywords to the words that most frequently appear in people’s searches online. With a list of keywords for each client, we can work to yield higher numbers of new patient inquiries into one’s practice.

Review Management

We can highlight positive and easily-readable reviews of a client’s practice on the website. After reading the reviews, patients will be more likely to consider a practice for dental care.

Hyper-Local Targeting

We will increase the focus of a client’s website to the local area and enhance the client’s reach to possible patients there. By targeting the local area, we can help the client rank higher online in the local area.

Social Media

We will not only help monitor and create regular posts for the client’s social media pages, but we will also ensure that the social media pages remain active and engage followers.

Start with a strong foot forward

We help clients build trustworthy relationships with their patients by providing strong online content. We also provide ranking reports and help maximize the client’s website for better results. Working with Doctor Genius, clients can start their practice by putting a strong foot forward with a professional, mobile-first website. If you are interested in the CDA event, visit the website to register. If you wish to know more about Doctor Genius and our services, view our website for more details.

nextPost.title: DIY Self-Straightening Options Versus Professional Care
nextPost.excerpt: With the advancements in dental products that people can buy over the counter, people may avoid regular checkups at the [ More.. ]
nextPost.content:
With the advancements in dental products that people can buy over the counter, people may avoid regular checkups at the dentist until they are absolutely necessary. Professionals are growing more accustomed to patients avoiding treatment until it is absolutely necessary. Unfortunately, a new trend may put patients in more danger and more risk of causing permanent damage than they realize with new DIY, Do It Yourself, orthodontic straightening options.

DIY needs more than just instructions

In a report from ABC Action News in Philadelphia, PA, available on 6abc.com, the article states “Orthodontists say this alarming trend appears to be on the rise,” adding that, “Most likely it’s due to the cost and time it takes for professional straightening.” DIY trends are popular for multiple reasons, including:
  • Achieving a sense of accomplishment
  • Saving money
  • Personalizing a useful product to use in the house
  • Creating a fun activity to spend time with others
However, a DIY tooth straightening is not similar to an at-home cure for a sore throat or skin moisturizer. There is a reason that orthodontists are required to have two to three extra years of studying in dental school to specialize in orthodontics and patients need to realize that. The DIY teeth-straightening products range from self-placing rubber bands for closing gaps to even using 3D printer technology for creating orthodontic trays. The American Association of Orthodontics, AAO, explains in further detail on their website, mylifemysmile.org that they are “urging consumers to beware of Internet videos and websites which encourage people to try and straighten their own teeth.” The DIY teeth-straightening products range from self-placing rubber bands for closing gaps to even using 3D printer technology for creating orthodontic trays. Orthodontic dentists have the tools, knowledge and skills necessary to safely perform straightening procedures. Self-straightening options will only cause more issues and risk further damage to the individual’s teeth.

Help patients understand the risk

It can be easy for patients to choose a DIY solution instead of a professional procedure after comparing the cost. Patients need to understand why they need to seek professional treatment as opposed to these cheap and dangerous DIY solutions. One effective method of doing this is to create a website that conveys this message.

The American Association of Orthodontics, AAO, explains in further detail on their website, mylifemysmile.org that they are “urging consumers to beware of Internet videos and websites which encourage people to try and straighten their own teeth.”
At Doctor Genius, we can help create and maintain an active website that presents the necessary information of a professional’s practice in a readable and informative manner. The AAO continues to highlight that DIY treatment options can lead to:
  • Permanent tooth loss
  • Lifelong dental problems
  • Spending more money to repair the excess damage
Patients need to understand from a professional’s website and visits to the professional’s office that DIY solutions are not an effective substitute for professional care. Doctor Genius can also highlight and display the professional’s specialties in such a way as to help inform possible patients about these services. At Doctor Genius, we also help build and maintain social media pages to actively engage followers and patients online. By actively engaging patients and displaying information in an effective manner, we can help professionals bring patients in for the safe and necessary care they need. Patients will understand why DIY orthodontic and dental treatments are not the most effective or beneficial option. For more information about our services or for answers to any questions, give us a call at 877-477-2311.
